title: Did the Native American Scouts' long hair save the potential of "almost supernatural" during the Vietnam War?
subtitle: It's assumed that the Native American trackers were recruited by the U.S. military to serve during the Vietnam War.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Native American Army has been recruited as explorers in the Vietnam War, and the Army has discovered - during their training - that long hair actually helps to give people the ability to trace "almost supernatural."
